title: Ancient Amulet
content: 'I always knew this day would arrive,' Maela sighed, 'but I hoped it would come later, Kael. Hyrule faces great peril. You must learn our family's hidden secrets. This amulet,' she held it out, its intricate designs catching the dim light, casting glimmers around the room, 'was your father's, passed through generations. It's not just a pretty neckless; it's reservoir of ancient powers. If misused, it's a serious danger to the user and others. Our ancestors bound a fraction of their essence into this very amulet. With it, you can call forth their wisdom, strength, and powers.'
